name: Avoid undocumented Sections
description:
This rule searches for Cobol programs containing sections in PROCEDURE division without any comment.

Note: Empty sections are excluded from violation list.
output:
Associated to each COBOL Program with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- The number of violation patterns
- Bookmarks for violation patterns found in source code:
  - Undocumented section in PROCEDURE division
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact
remediation: Add comments into sections to explain what is their goal and how they work.
